archimate:BusinessObject.name: DunningNotification
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: A DunningNotification is a communication or joint activity from the Telecommunication Operator to the customer to ask for a CustomerPayment or negotiate a PaymentPlan. The relation resulting from a DunningCaseRule might be • either only from the telecommunication operator to the customer (Ex: send a SMS) • or in both ways (Ex: a CSR call the customer to negotiate a PaymentPlan).
